item.title: By: Vitor Pereira
item.dc:creator: Vitor Pereira
item.description: <p>Have fun! Seems like a well deserved vacation. See you in Dublin.</p>
item.content:encoded: Have fun! Seems like a well deserved vacation. See you in Dublin.

item.title: By: Jess Stratton
item.dc:creator: Jess Stratton
item.description: <p>There is nothing that makes me happier than hearing (reading) people say that life is very, very good. To quote Zoolander, "That Matt White is so hot right now!" You will do awesome, and will have so much fun. Best of luck to you!<br /></p>
item.content:encoded: There is nothing that makes me happier than hearing (reading) people say that life is very, very good. To quote Zoolander, “That Matt White is so hot right now!” You will do awesome, and will have so much fun. Best of luck to you!

item.title: By: Kerr
item.dc:creator: Kerr
item.description: <p>I hope that the second present was meant to indicate you appreciate that sort of thing, rather than that you need to get reading.<br /><br /><img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif"</a> /> </p>
item.content:encoded:
I hope that the second present was meant to indicate you appreciate that sort of thing, rather than that you need to get reading.

http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$File/wink.gif“ />
